column95: Earnest money only in the shape of small saving instruments, bankerscheque, demand draft or fixed
The cost of tender form only in shape of demand draft duly pledged in favour of Executive Engine
Certificate of registration with IPH Department in appropriate class and latest renewal thereof
Income tax and sales tax registration and latest clearance certificate thereof.
The bidder should satisfy the Engineer-in-Charge that non uncompleted more than two works.
Average annual financial turnover during the last three years should be atleast 30 percent
Labour license issued by the competent authority must be attached
An affidavit that firm has never been blacklisted by any Government Semi government organization
Form 6 duly signed by the Contractor
